column1:
This content is localised to your crisis context prior to deployment. For example: 

[Refugees and Asylum Information from UNHCR](https://help.unhcr.org/)

Local numbers for emergency support can go here. For example, [Nigeria's NCFRMI](https://www.ncfrmi.com/#)
Local numbers and international resources for mental health support can go here. This content is localised prior to deployment.
Local numbers for emergency medical care can go here. This content is localised prior to deployment.
Local and international resources for natural disasters can go here. This content is localised prior to deployment.
Local and international resources for family referrals can go here. This content is localised prior to deployment.
